title: Anatomy of a Typeface
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054720/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Books](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054720/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Books): Anatomy of a Typeface**

[Alexander Lawson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054720/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alexander%20Lawson) reviews some classic faces and explains their history and compares/contrasts with similar faces.

see: [http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0879233338/typophile-20](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054720/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0879233338/typophile-20 "http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/0879233338/typophile-20")
author: ken
